content.raw: Wow!  That seems like a drastic change to make at this point in the competition.  Are you really sure you want to do that?  Don't get me wrong, I personally like the change, but it's not just Dan whose spidey sense of fairness is tingling.  If it was me, I'd just keep the 400 force on closing; that just enforces something that was already expressed in the rules.
